title: Textile, ca. 1835
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Repeat H (fabric not as wide as roller): 56.5 cm (22 1/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (a): 115 x 73 cm (45 1/4 x 28 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 115.5 x 24.5 cm (45 1/2 x 9 5/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 85 x 25.5 cm (33 7/16 x 10 1/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Textile Department Fund
description: Five scenes of Paris featuring monuments or buildings in Paris. Printed in red.
